org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.component

Class GuiScrollBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
      • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.client.gui.component.GuiScrollBar

  • public class GuiScrollBar
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.Gui
    A reusable scrollbar for guis. The using gui must call the following methods from its respective method: * handleMouseInput() * drawCurrentScreen(int, int, float) * drawGuiContainerBackgroundLayer(float, int, int)
